headline: Jefferies upgrades Rollins on sales hiring surge, sees growth ahead
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies upgraded pest control firm Rollins Inc (NYSE:ROL) to Buy from Hold and raised its price target to $65 from $55 given a sharp increase in sales hiring that could signal accelerating organic growth over the next year.

content.title: Jefferies upgrades Rollins on sales hiring surge, sees growth ahead
content.summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies upgraded pest control firm Rollins Inc (NYSE:ROL) to Buy from Hold and raised its price target to $65 from $55 given a sharp increase in sales hiring that could signal accelerating organic growth over the next year.
